Description: Administrative unit code (e.g., GH0707) uniquely identifying geographic region
Administrative municipality name (e.g., Greater Accra, Ashanti)
Typical Range: Ghana, Ashanti, Greater Accra, Oti, etc.

Description: Month-start date for the aggregation period (aligned to 1st of month)
Missing Data Handling: No missing values (aligned to month start)

Description: Cumulative rainfall over the entire month (sum of 3 dekads)
Missing Data Handling: NaN if source rfh data unavailable, handled using the mean

Description: Maximum 10-day rainfall peak within the month
Missing Data Handling: NaN if source rfh data unavailable, handled using the mean

Description: Average rainfall anomaly for the month (deviation from long-term average)
Missing Data Handling: NaN if source rfh data unavailable, handled using the mean

Description: Count of dekads with measurable rainfall (rfh > 0); ranges 0 to 3
Standardized Precipitation Index at 3-month scale; captures drought/wetness
Missing Data Handling: NaN if spi3 not calculated in source, handled using mean imputation

Description: Standardized Precipitation Index at 6-month scale; captures drought/wetness
Missing Data Handling: NaN if spi6 not calculated in source, handled using mean or median imputation

Description: Calendar year of the observation for temporal stratification
2-year return period rainfall threshold computed via Gumbel distribution
Source/Calculation: FIRST(return_2yr) per month (Gumbel fitted to annual maxima)
Missing Data Handling: NaN if return periods not computed, handled using the mean

Description: 5-year return period rainfall threshold computed via Gumbel distribution
Source/Calculation: FIRST(return_5yr) per month (Gumbel fitted to annual maxima)
Missing Data Handling: NaN if return periods not computed, handled using the mean

Description: 10-year return period rainfall threshold computed via Gumbel distribution
Source/Calculation: FIRST(return_10yr) per month (Gumbel fitted to annual maxima)
Missing Data Handling: NaN if return periods not computed, handled using the mean

Description: Binary flag: 1 if monthly_max_rfh exceeds 2-year return period, 0 otherwise
Source/Calculation: MAX(exceeds_2yr) aggregated monthly; 1 if any dekad exceeds
Missing Data Handling: No missing values as periods have been computed

Description: Binary flag: 1 if monthly_max_rfh exceeds 5-year return period, 0 otherwise
Source/Calculation: MAX(exceeds_5yr) aggregated monthly; 1 if any dekad exceeds
Missing Data Handling: No missing values as periods have been computed

Description: Binary flag: 1 if monthly_max_rfh exceeds 10-year return period, 0 otherwise
Source/Calculation: MAX(exceeds_10yr) aggregated monthly; 1 if any dekad exceeds
Missing Data Handling: No missing values as periods have been computed
